attributes.action: scrap the Local Transport Bill and any other plans for road charging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road Charging, alone or in addition to current tax burdens, is not only grossly unfair, but is also against the express wishes of the British public. We urge the Prime Minister - current and incoming - to heed the wishes of over 2 million of his employers who signed an earlier petition as well as the millions of others who didnt get the chance, to represent the wishes of those people and to scrap plans for road charging once and for all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
